title: Tadej Poga훾ar Powers to 24th Win in 2024 in Solo Blast at Giro delle Emilia
content:
Poga훾ar pounced with about 38km to go to drop an elite field in the 107th edition of the Italian classic. Longo Borghini wins the women's race.

Read the full article at Tadej Poga훾ar Powers to 24th Win in 2024 in Solo Blast at Giro delle Emilia on Velo.
author: ahood
